TextLibrary.Text: I do, but I think I've started a civil war in Hyaan. One of the Gnolls, called Staf, is now in charge.

I do, but I think I've started a civil war in Hyaan. One of the Gnolls, called Staf, is now in charge.
Staf? He is treacherous. You'd best be careful if you deal with him again. You have returned the 97th piece - only four more remain.
